snippet.title: FREE DLC Trailer Visitors from Morta | Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous
snippet.description:
In Visitors from Morta DLC, John and Lucy from Children of Morta get into trouble in the Worldwound, and only the Commander can help them overcome the dangers and return to their world. Along with John and Lucy, the world of Pathfinder will be infiltrated by the Corruption and the Commander will need to stop the spread of evil. And don't forget to save Ryker, the Bergson family's wolf cub!

Add the DLC:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3116830/Pathfinder_Wrath_of_the_Righteous__Visitors_from_Morta/
EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/pathfinder-wrath-of-the-righteous--visitor-from-morta

Pathifnder: Wrath of the Righteous:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1184370/Pathfinder_Wrath_of_the_Righteous__Enhanced_Edition/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/pathfinder_wrath_of_the_righteous
EGS: https://store.epicgames.com/en-US/p/pathfinder-wrath-of-the-righteous

Children of Morta:
https://childrenofmorta.com/
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/330020/Children_of_Morta/
GOG: https://www.gog.com/game/children_of_morta

Follow our official media to stay up-to-date with any and all news:
Official site: https://owlcat.games/
Twitter:  https://twitter.com/OwlcatGames
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/owlcat
Facebook:  https://www.facebook.com/PathfinderCRPG
Pathfinder: Wrath of the Righteous on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1184370/Pathfinder_Wrath_of_the_Righteous__Enhanced_Edition/
